Package io.streamthoughts.azkarra.api.query

Interface RemoteQueryClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpRemoteQueryClient
    public interface RemoteQueryClient
    Default interface to query a remote streams state store.

    • Method Summary

      Executes a query to the specified server.

    • Method Detail

      • query

        <K,​V> CompletableFuture<QueryResult<K,​V>> query​(StreamsServerInfo server,
                                                            QueryInfo query,
                                                            Queried options)
        Executes a query to the specified server.
        Parameters:
        server - the StreamsServerInfo to query.
        query - the QueryInfo to send.
        options - the Queried options.
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture of QueryResult.
